title: Medical Breakthroughs and Prevention
brief_description: Worldwide, millions of dollars have been spent on researching ways to combat one of the most deadly and feared diseases known to mankind - cancer. The “Beyond 2000” team takes a penetrating global look at the very latest methods being used to treat cancer and assist existing sufferers. In addition, they examine how preventative medicine is playing an increasingly important role in the war to stop cancer.
